title: Managerial Accounting and Control
description: Focus on planning, managing, controlling, and evaluating costs for competitive advantage in global markets. Key topics will include cost structure, cost-based managerial decision making, strategic cost management, JIT/TQC cost management, and accounting control systems. Renumbered from IRGN 440. Students may not receive credit for GPIM 440 and IRGN 440. Prerequisites: GPCO 415 or consent of instructor.
